name: Drag n' Drop (MAJOR W.I.P)
description: Drag n' Drop is a simple puzzle game made by 2 friends and a little bit of inspiration from Sam Hogan's Cell Machine. It's a pixel-art game with sprites made by Kenzei R, with fun gameplay programmed by Alan T. This game was made ENTIRELY within GDevlop 5. PLEASE make sure to play the web version in fullscreen. Also, please keep in mind that this game is being worked on almost entirely on school computers, so if there are any bugs it's because we were rushing the bell. PLEASE let us know of any bugs.
